name: Ghost Panther
text: Penance — Action: Discard cards from the top of your deck until a Wakanda Forever card is discarded → add that card to your hand. (Limit once per round.)

name: T’Challa
text: You cannot include allies in your deck. Action: shuffle 1 identity-specific card from your discard pile into your deck (limit once per round.)

name: Penitence
text: Permanent. Hero Response (attack): After you attach this card to an enemy deal them 3 damage. Hero Response (thwart): After you attach this card to a scheme remove 2 threat from it.

name: Wakanda Forever
text: Hero Action: Choose: • Resolve the ability “Hero Response” of Penitence . • Find and attach Penitence to an enemy or a scheme. Black Panther is gone but Wakanda is eternal.

name: The hour of Penance
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 6 damage to an enemy. Deal 3 damage to the enemy with Penitence attached.

name: Offering to the Goddess
text: Response: After you defeat a minion, place 1 essence counter here. Alter-Ego Action: remove 2 essence counters from Offering to the Goddess and exhaust it → draw 2 cards.

name: The Panther
text: You may play The Panther from your discard pile during your turn (limit once per round). Hero Action (attack/thwart) : Choose to either deal 5 damage to an enemy or remove 3 threat from a scheme.

name: Zarathos
text: Alter-Ego Response: After you change to this form, heal 2 damage from your identity. Hero Response: After you change to this form, draw 1 card.

name: The Golden City
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust The Golden City → choose: • Search for a [[preparation ]]card in your deck and add it to your hand. • Shuffle a [[preparation ]]card from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Aborption of the Mind
text: Max 1 per player. Hero Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, discard Aborption of the Mind → prevent 2 of that damage and draw 1 card.

name: Wakanda Protector
text: Hero Response: After you defeat a side scheme, exhaust Wakanda Protector → draw 2 cards.

name: Everything is Under Control
text: Max 1 per player. Interrupt: When any amount of threat would be placed on a scheme, discard Everything is Under Control → prevent 2 of that threat and draw 1 card.
